toxi.geom

Interface Reflector3D

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Intersector3D
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SphereIntersectorReflector

    public interface Reflector3D
extends Intersector3D
    Generic interface for ray reflection with 3D geometry
